meanings.definition: The act of spoiling the appearance of something
meanings.sent1: The disfigurement of the painting was heartbreaking.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't bear to look at the disfigurement on her face.
meanings.sent3: The disfigurement of the cake made it look like a sad clown.
meanings.sent4: The disfigurement of the landscape by the storm was devastating.
meanings.sent5: The disfigurement of the statue was a stark reminder of time's passage.

meanings.definition: The state of being spoiled in appearance
meanings.sent1: His disfigurement was a result of the accident.
meanings.sent2: The disfigurement of the garden was due to neglect.
meanings.sent3: The disfigurement of the costume made him look like a clumsy superhero.
meanings.sent4: The disfigurement of the city skyline by billboards was unsightly.
meanings.sent5: The disfigurement of the book cover made it unrecognizable.
